name: Ice Oni
text: Your Turn At the end of battle between this character and an opponent's 5 cost or lower character, place the opponent's character at the bottom of the owner's deck.

effect.text: At the end of battle between this character and an opponent's 5 cost or lower character, place the opponent's character at the bottom of the owner's deck.

meta.notes: Rarity 'C' is visible in the bottom right corner. The card is a sample, indicated by the watermark.
